item.title: --Fixed--
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Show me all the lines stated in the exception.

Read full topic

item.title: --Fixed--
item.dc:creator: @hitman2009 hitman2009
item.description:
@hitman2009 wrote:

i used that, get 0 errors, and then when i run my server this spams:

        at NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:2720)
        at process.run(process.java:25)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:2720)
        at process.run(process.java:25)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Read full topic

item.title: --Fixed--
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

for(int i = 0; i < maxNPCSpawns; i++;) { if(npcs[i].npcType == 3000) { if(misc.random(5) == 0) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Crush them underfoot!"; } else if(misc.random(5) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "All glory to Bandos!"; } else if(misc.random(5) == 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Break their bones!"; } } }
Should hopefully work the same?

Read full topic

item.title: --Fixed--
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Dell:

LMAO FINALLY!?

No you wouldn’t use it, I mixed that up from another group, my mistake. Although I didn’t like the way you phrased that.

Read full topic

item.title: --Fixed--
item.dc:creator: @hitman2009 hitman2009
item.description:
@hitman2009 wrote:

What’s wrong with the code? ik i cant use two “elses”, and ive tried to change it. What would i change it to?

for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCSpawns; i++) {
			if(npcs[i].npcType == 3000){
if(misc.random(25)==0){
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if(misc.random(1)==0){
npcs[i].textUpdate = "Crush them underfoot!";
} else {
npcs[i].textUpdate = "All glory to Bandos!";
} else {
npcs[i].textUpdate = "Break their bones!";
}
}
}

Read full topic
